title: Take Screenshots (Screen Capture) from R Command
text: can use screenshot() take screenshot easily. locate image screenshot, use locate_image(). case, bottom left corner screenshot image cut needle image. Windows, clipboad image can saved save_clipboard_image().
code: library(screenshot) sc <- screenshot() sc_image <- imager::load.image(sc) plot(sc_image) sc <- screenshot() sc_image <- imager::load.image(sc) w <- 100 h <- 80 pos_x <- 1 pos_y <- imager::height(sc_image) - h needle <- hay2needle(sc_image, pos_x, pos_y, w, h) (locate_image(needle)) # center location pos <- locate_image(needle, center = FALSE) found <- hay2needle(sc_image, pos[1], pos[2], w, h) layout(c(1:3)) plot(sc_image) plot(needle) plot(found) path_img <- "path_of_png_file" save_clipboard_image(path_img) shell.exec(path_img)
